welcome:
Welcome to the Ultimate Rock, Paper, Scissors game!

To win, you must beat the computer 3 rounds out of 5. Let's play!
invalid_entry: Invalid entry. Please enter r) Rock, p) Paper, s) Scissors, l) Lizard or sp) Spock
play_again: Do you want to play again? (y/n)
invalid_answer: Invalid entry. Please enter Yes or No
new_round_greeting: To win, you must beat the computer 3 rounds out of 5.
